resources.string: if you are ever feeling alone and struggling, talking with someone really helps. Whenever you feel like it, we are here to listen- we are here for you. Enter a nickname for you below and chat with someone at Believe.

meditation can provide deep relaxation and tranquility. During meditation, you can focus your mind, and eliminate the flow of disorganized thoughts that can fill your mind and cause stress. This process can improve physical and emotional health.

Believe is an initiative to make mental health more accessible to the Nepalese community. Our motto is ‘Bring Back the Child in You’. We believe that everyone deserves to be happy and loved like they once were.
